text: Cristina Lestander (born June 27, 1962 as Cristina Wirz) is a former Swiss curler. She is a . She competed at the 1988 Winter Olympics when curling was a demonstration sport. She works for Swiss Curling Association.Geschäftsstelle und Kommunikation – swisscurling ==Awards== *Frances Brodie Award: 1989. ==Teams== ===Women's=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col"| Season !
